channel.title: INtravel
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtravel, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Allegiant to acquire rival Sun Country Airlines in budget airline merger
item.description: Allegiant Air plans to acquire rival Sun Country Airlines in a merger that would bring together two of America's ultra-low-cost carriers.

item.title: 7 reasons to get the Hilton Amex Aspire Card
item.description: Not sure if the premium Hilton Aspire credit card is right for you? This list of reasons might help you decide to get this American Express card.

item.title: American's new Airbus A321XLR set for 2 more transcontinental routes, Boston debut in coming months
item.description: American Airlines' new Airbus A321XLR is set to bring more transcontinental routes between major coastal cities.

item.title: Not a filler benefit: How this 1 under-the-radar card perk saved me $1,400
item.description: I initially thought this credit card benefit was a filler, but the extended warranty perk recently saved me $1,400. Here's how.

item.title: Avelo consolidates bases and fleet, ends deportation flights amid broader restructuring
item.description: Avelo Airlines said it was closing three of its bases and reconsolidating its network around the remaining four as it seeks to firm up its finances.
